subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE
body:
Dear Wendi,

Many thanks for your timely response towards my project as my interest major on Real Estate
and on a long-term basis.

Actually, my family have suffered lots  of betrayal and denial since the beginning of our ordeal,
but if you are one with conscience, and can understand the agony of a woman with Christian
background in a Muslim community, I think we can work as a team to achieve this venture.

After my family bank accounts, both local and international were frozen by the then government
of Egypt with the help of some Western banks, we secretly move the sum of U.S $50,000,000.00
(Fifty Million United States Dollars), to one of the Financial Firm in Netherlands, whose name I will
disclose to you immediately am convinced you will not betray me.

If you are trustworthy and have a heart of human to help a widow who is disarray, and can keep this
transaction secret and confidential to  yourself, please respond to this mail through my private email
address:- suzannehosnimubarak1@hotmail.com, by sending your full names, physical address, direct
phone number and any means of your identification.

I shall draft and deliver to you, a memorandum of understanding, which you will be required to sign
and send back to me before I furnish you the full details on how you will receive the funds.

Find attached are my family and personal pix for proper identification.
Regards,
Madam Suzanne.

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you for sharing your story with me. I'm truly sorry to hear about the difficulties you and your family have been facing. It must be really tough, especially in a community where you feel like an outsider due to your religious beliefs.

Your project sounds intriguing, but I would love to know more about it. Could you please provide some more details? What exactly is the nature of this venture? How do you plan on using the funds?

I understand that trust is a big issue here, and I want to assure you that I am genuinely interested in helping out. However, as a matter of personal policy, I don't share my contact information online.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

I'm really sorry to hear about the difficulties you and your family have been facing. It must be incredibly tough, especially in a community where you feel isolated due to your faith. I can't even begin to imagine what that's like.

Your project sounds very interesting, and I'd love to learn more about it. Real Estate is a field that has always fascinated me. However, I'm a bit confused about some details. You mentioned moving a large sum of money to a financial firm - could you tell me more about this? How does this relate to the real estate project?

Also, you mentioned a memorandum that I would need to sign. Could you provide more information on what this entails? 

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE...
body:
My Dear Wendy,

Thank you once again for your prompt response. The money was moved through my
charity organization and deposited with Corporate Finance Company Netherlands
for safe keeping. www.corporatefinsnl.com<http://www.corporatefinsnl.com>

I would like you to claim the fund on behalf of my family and invest in any good business
of your choice with good returns. Although, my areas of interest may be Real Estate but
that does not have anything to do with the business of your choice as far as its lucrative.

Concerning the (Memorandum of Understanding), it will serve as a working agreement binding
us together in this project. However, be rest assured that your contact information will be 100%
safe with me same way am believing that mine will also be safe with you hence, both will appear
on the MOU Document.

I look forward to receiving your full names, physical address, direct phone number and any means
of your identification so that we may proceed.
Regards,
Madam Suzanne.

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE...
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite an interesting proposition you've put forth. I'm intrigued by the idea of investing in a lucrative business, especially real estate as it has always been a field of interest to me.

However, before we proceed further, could you kindly provide more information about this Corporate Finance Company where the funds are kept? Also, could you elaborate on the Memorandum and how it will bind us together in this project?

I understand that trust is paramount in such dealings and I assure you that your contact is safe with me. However, I would like to know more about the process and what it entails before sharing any personal details.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE... .
body:
My Dear Wendy.

I acknowledge receipt of your mail and wish to inform you that any further information about
Corporate Finance Company can be obtained from their website:www.corporatefinsnl.com<http://www.corporatefinsnl.com>

However, attached is a sample of how the content of the MOU will read. The process to claim
the fund is that, you will be required to visit their office in Amsterdam to sign some classified
documents, after which, the fund (US$50 M.) will be irrevocable and unconditional be released
to you through their affiliated bank(s) to your nominated bank account.
Regards,
Madam Suzanne.

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE... .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you so much for your prompt response. I'm quite intrigued by the process you've outlined. It sounds like a fascinating adventure to embark on.

Could you please provide more details about these classified documents that need to be signed? What kind of information do they contain? Also, could you explain a bit more about how the fund will be released and transferred?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE... .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you so much for your prompt response. I'm quite intrigued by the process you've outlined. It sounds like a fascinating journey to embark on.

I'm curious, could you please elaborate more on these classified documents that need signing? What kind of information do they contain? Also, is it absolutely necessary for me to visit the office in person or is there an alternative way to handle this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE. .. .
body:
My Dear Wendi,

The Classified Documents are official paper works normally signed by beneficiaries or recipients
of funds before payments are released by any organization or institution. You are even required
to read through before appending your signature on them.

However, I would advise you visit the company in person and see things yourself. You will also
have the opportunity if you like, to open offshore account(s) in different banks, in your names.
They are there to assist you achieve that without any stress.

This will help eliminate any unnecessary questions from your banking authority because of the
volume of the amount.
Regards,
Madam Suzanne

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE. .. .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting to learn about the process of handling classified documents and offshore accounts. I must admit, it's all a bit new to me.

You mentioned visiting the company in person. Could you please provide more details about this? Where is the company located? Also, could you explain a bit more about how opening an offshore account would work?

I'm looking forward to learning more about this process.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   .. .
body:
My Dear,

The company is located in Netherlands, Western Europe.
As for the account(s), when the time comes, you will be guided on how to open a non-residential offshore account.

Thank you.
Regards,
Madam Suzanne.

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   .. .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you for your prompt response. Western Europe sounds like a fascinating place! I've always wanted to visit there. 

You mentioned something about an offshore account, could you please elaborate more on that? How does it work and why is it necessary?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   ..  .
body:
My Dear,

The non-residential offshore online account is the type of account that you can operate online in any part of the world.

Although, it is not necessary if your account can accommodate the US$50 Million without raising red flag from your bank.
Regards,
Madam Suzanne.

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   ..  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you for your explanation about the offshore online account. It sounds very convenient to be able to operate it from any part of the world. I'm curious, how does one go about setting up such an account? And what are the benefits of having an offshore account compared to a regular bank account?

Also, could you please elaborate on what you mean by "if your account can the US Million without raising red flag from your bank"? I'm not quite sure I understand that part.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
My Dear,

You can operate offshore online account in your home without visiting the bank. They will guide you on how to set up one and possibly linked it to your account when you are ready.

As for the red flag comment, your bank is likely to call you up for questioning when you receive huge amount of money you have not own before in the account, or have not received million Dollars in the account too.
Regards,
Madam Suzanne.

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you for your informative message. It's fascinating to learn that one can operate an offshore online account from home without visiting the bank. Could you please elaborate on how this process works? I'm particularly interested in understanding the steps involved in setting up such an account.

Also, regarding the comment about the bank calling up when receiving a large amount of money, could you clarify what measures are taken to ensure that these transactions are secure and legitimate?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
My Dear,

The professionals in the banking industry will put you through at the appropriate time.

However, be rest assured that the transaction will be carried out under a legitimate arrangement that is the most reason you should be there in person to witness the process.

If I may ask, what is the worth of your bank account?
Regards,
Madam Suzanne

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about the banking industry and the processes involved. I'm not quite sure what you mean by "the worth of my bank account". Could you please clarify? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
My Dear,

What I meant is the highest money you have received in your account and your current account balance.

This will determine if your account can receive this US$50 Million directly or not.

However, it is important you send the required information so that we may proceed if actually you are still interested.
Regards,
Madam Suzanne.

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm quite intrigued by your proposal, but I must admit, I'm a bit confused. Could you please clarify what exactly this US Million is? And why would my account balance or the highest amount of money I've received in my past transactions be relevant to this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm quite intrigued by your proposal, but I must admit, I'm not entirely sure what you're asking. Could you please clarify what you mean by the "highest money" I've received in my account? 

Also, as much as I'd love to help, I don't feel comfortable sharing my current account balance online. Is there another way we can determine if my account can receive this US Million directly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm quite intrigued by your proposal, but I must admit, I'm a bit confused. Could you please clarify what exactly this US Million is? And why would my account balance or the highest amount of money I've received in my past transactions affect its reception?

Best regards.

Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm intrigued by your proposal, but I must admit, I'm a bit confused. Could you please clarify what exactly you're asking for? Are you suggesting that there's a certain amount of money that my account needs to be able to receive?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Wendi,

I think am old enough to be your mother and as such, deserve some respect from you.

Your too much irrelevant questions are becoming embarrassing. Please keep your account balance to yourself, I am not interested. When we get to the bridge, the financial experts will advise appropriately.

If you are really interested in this transaction, send your require information so that we may proceed or forever hold your peace.

Madam Suzanne.

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm intrigued by your proposal, but I must admit, I'm a bit confused. Could you please clarify what exactly you're asking for? 

You mentioned something about the highest amount of money I've received in my account and my current balance. While I understand your curiosity, it's generally not considered safe to share such sensitive financial information online.

Could we perhaps discuss more about the nature of this US Million you mentioned? It sounds quite interesting!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your patience with me, as I'm just trying to understand everything clearly. 

You mentioned financial experts who will advise when we get to the bridge. Could you please elaborate more on that? Who are these experts and what kind of advice will they provide?

Also, could you clarify what specific requirements you need from me to proceed? I want to make sure I have everything in order.

Thank you for your time and understanding.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
The company, Corporate Finance is made up of financial experts to advise us when there is need and the requirements for us to proceed are your full names, physical address, direct phone number and any means of your identification.

I will not entertain any more question or questions from you until I receive the above information.

Madam Suzanne.

subject: Re: FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

Thank you for reaching out and providing information about Corporate Finance. It sounds like a team of experts indeed! I'm always eager to learn more about such organizations.

Could you please share more details about the kind of advice they provide? And how do they usually assist their clients in making financial decisions?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS FROM SUZANNE.   . .  .
body:
Hello Madam Suzanne,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm intrigued by your proposal, but I must admit, I'm a bit confused. Could you please clarify what exactly you're asking for? 

You mentioned something about the highest amount of money I've received in my account and my current balance. However, I don't quite understand why this information is necessary. Could you explain how it relates to receiving the US Million directly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi
